means: （使）清洁( clean的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He cleaned the flakes away with his coat sleeve.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用大衣袖子把碎屑掸掉。

sentence.Network_en: I cleaned myself up a bit, and got the baby ready.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拾掇了一下自己，把宝宝也收拾妥当。

sentence.Network_en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Can be cleaned can also use washing machine ., 可以干洗也可以使用洗衣机洗.

春节有关的英语单词_百度知道 ... 辞旧岁 bid farewell to the old year 扫房 spring cleaning 年糕 Nian-gao.
海运常用英文词汇缩写 - 天狼2008 ... (船员，乘客)健康证明 bill of health 光票 clean bill 不清洁提单 foul bill.

entry.tran: 干净的;洁净的;无污迹的
entry.def: Something that is clean is free from dirt or unwanted marks.

example.ex: He wore his cleanest slacks, a clean shirt and a navy blazer...
example.tran: 他穿着他最干净的便裤，洁净的衬衫和藏青色上装。

example.ex: Disease has not been a problem because clean water is available...
example.tran: 不必担心会生病，因为能喝上干净水。

entry.tran: (人或动物)讲卫生的，爱干净的
entry.def: You say that people or animals are clean when they keep themselves or their surroundings clean.

entry.tran: (燃料或化学作用)无害的，无污染的，清洁的
entry.def: A clean fuel or chemical process does not create many harmful or polluting substances.

example.ex: Fans of electric cars say they are clean, quiet and economical.
example.tran: 电动汽车迷们说，电动车清洁、无噪音而且经济。

entry.def: If you clean something or clean dirt off it, you make it free from dirt and unwanted marks, for example by washing or wiping it. If something cleans easily, it is easy to clean.

example.ex: Her father cleaned his glasses with a paper napkin...
example.tran: 她父亲用纸巾把眼镜擦干净。

example.ex: It took half an hour to clean the orange powder off the bath...
example.tran: 花了半个钟头才把浴缸上的柑橘粉擦洗掉。

entry.def: If you clean a room or house, you make the inside of it and the furniture in it free from dirt and dust.

example.ex: With them also lived Mary Burinda, who cooked and cleaned...
example.tran: 和他们同住的还有玛丽·伯琳达，她负责做饭和打扫卫生。

example.ex: She got up early and cleaned the flat.
example.tran: 她早早就起了床，把公寓打扫干净。

entry.tran: (书籍、笑话、生活方式)文明的，不淫秽的，不下流的
entry.def: If you describe something such as a book, joke, or lifestyle as clean, you think that they are not sexually immoral or offensive.

example.ex: They're trying to show clean, wholesome, decent movies...
example.tran: 他们尽量播放文明、健康、正派的电影。

example.ex: Flirting is good clean fun...
example.tran: 打情骂俏无伤大雅，还别有一番趣味。

entry.def: If someone has a clean reputation or record, they have never done anything illegal or wrong.

example.ex: Accusations of tax evasion have tarnished his clean image...
example.tran: 避税的指控使他的清白形象蒙污。

example.ex: You can hire these from most car hire firms, provided you have a clean driving licence.
example.tran: 只要你的驾照没有违规记录，就可以从多数租车公司租到这些车。

entry.tran: (比赛或打斗)无舞弊行为的，公平的，不违规的
entry.def: A clean game or fight is carried out fairly, according to the rules.

example.ex: He called for a clean fight in the election and an end to 'negative campaigning'...
example.tran: 他呼吁选举中进行公平竞争，结束“负面竞选”。

example.ex: It was a clean match, well refereed.
example.tran: 比赛没有舞弊行为，裁判很公正。

entry.tran: (口味、气味或色彩)淡雅的，清新的，明快的
entry.def: If you describe a flavour, smell, or colour as clean, you like it because it is light and fresh.

example.ex: ...the fresh, clean smell of the sea...
example.tran: 大海清新舒爽的气味

example.ex: Soft tones of blue and grey create a clean, bright look.
example.tran: 蓝色和灰色的柔和色调营造出明快、亮丽的视觉感观。

entry.def: A clean sheet of paper has no writing or drawing on it.

example.ex: Take a clean sheet of paper and down the left-hand side make a list.
example.tran: 拿张白纸，在左下方列个单子。

entry.def: If you make a clean break or start, you end a situation completely and start again in a different way.

example.ex: She wanted to make a clean break from her mother and father.
example.tran: 她想和父母一刀两断。

entry.def: Clean is used to emphasize that something was done completely.

example.ex: It burned clean through the seat of my overalls...
example.tran: 它把我工装裤屁股那块烧透了。

example.ex: The thief got clean away with the money...
example.tran: 那个贼拿着钱逃之夭夭了。

entry.tran: (形状)规则的，简洁的，边缘平滑的
entry.def: A clean shape is simple and regular, with definite, smooth edges.

example.ex: He admires the clean lines of Shaker furniture...
example.tran: 他欣赏夏克家具流畅的线条。

example.ex: The drill should be slowly rotated to ensure a clean hole.
example.tran: 钻头必须缓慢转动，以保证钻孔平整光滑。

entry.tran: (动作)干脆利落的，快速无误的
entry.def: You can describe an action as clean to indicate that it is carried out simply and quickly without mistakes.

example.ex: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway...
example.tran: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

example.ex: Paul had arrested countless men like this one before and was expecting a clean, quick job.
example.tran: 此前，保罗逮捕过无数个这样的家伙，他估计这次能手到擒来。

entry.def: If you come clean about something that you have been keeping secret, you admit it or tell people about it.

example.ex: It would be better if you come clean about it and let her know what kind of man she is seeing.
example.tran: 你最好一五一十地告诉她，让她知道她正在交往的那个男人是个什么货色。

auth_sentence.content: We took it to the laboratory and cleaned it.
auth_sentence.res_content: We took it to the laboratory and cleaned it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We took it to the laboratory and cleaned it.

auth_sentence.content: Your home will be cleaned, but not mopped.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your home will be cleaned, but not mopped.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your home will be cleaned, but not mopped.

auth_sentence.content: Whoever had cleaned it had done a good job.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whoever had cleaned it had done a good job.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whoever had cleaned it had done a good job.

Sentence.sentence: How soon do you think this can be cleaned?
The conference room has to be cleaned.
